CustomField.description: A Medical Specialty is a branch of medicine that focuses on a specific area or system of the body, or a particular patient population. Practitioners of a specialty undergo specialized training, education, and certification to provide advanced care and expertise in their area of specialization.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Select the doctor's medical specialty from the list. This indicates their advanced training and expertise in a specific area of medicine, ensuring the patient receives appropriate care.
CustomField.label: Medical Specialty
